body_html: I have tried almost all the methods of installing tensorflow cpu using pip....Nothing worked....Atlast found out that tensorflow versions can be installed using pip for only some particular versions...So download any one of the python versions mentioned in https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows and type the pip command given in the same link on command prompt.

body: I have tried almost all the methods of installing tensorflow cpu using pip....Nothing worked....Atlast found out that tensorflow versions can be installed using pip for only some particular versions...So download any one of the python versions mentioned in https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows and type the pip command given in the same link on command prompt.
